trans-unit.source: # Configuration file for fmorgue
trans-unit.target: ＃fmorgue的配置文件

trans-unit.source: # Possible values: yes/no
trans-unit.target: ＃可能的值：是/否

trans-unit.source: By default, the files are renamed according to their modification time, since the original file
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,文件会根据其修改时间进行重命名,因为原来的文件

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer
trans-unit.target: 聲明

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: File morgue (fmorgue) is a tool for mirroring files permanently to a remote server.
trans-unit.target: File morgue(fmorgue)是一个将文件永久镜像到远程服务器的工具。

trans-unit.source: In CGI mode, you have to create a config file in '/etc/fmorgue' The configuration file should look like this::
trans-unit.target: 在CGI模式下,你必须在'/etc/fmorgue'中创建一个配置文件,配置文件应该是这样的:。

trans-unit.source: In both operation modes, the server must be told were to store the retreived data.
trans-unit.target: 在这两种操作模式下,必须告诉服务器要存储检索到的数据。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to rsync and friends, it identifies missing files on the server only
trans-unit.target: 与rsync和friends相比,它只识别服务器上丢失的文件。

trans-unit.source: In standalone mode, you have to define the directory as command-line parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在单机模式下,你必须将该目录定义为命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Mirror files to a remote server, regardless of their name.
trans-unit.target: 镜像文件到远程服务器,无论其名称如何。

trans-unit.source: The client application
trans-unit.target: 客户端应用程序

trans-unit.source: The fmorgue client is expected to be called on a regular base, e.g. as cron job. It inspects
trans-unit.target: fmorgue客户端应该定期被调用,例如作为cron作业。它检查

trans-unit.source: The fmorgue server can either run as standalone application on a dedicated port, or as CGI script.
trans-unit.target: fmorgue服务器可以作为独立的应用程序在专用端口上运行,也可以作为CGI脚本运行。

trans-unit.source: The package installs two new shell commands, 'fmorgue' for the client application, and 'fmorgue-server'.
trans-unit.target: 这个软件包安装了两个新的shell命令,'fmorgue'用于客户端应用程序,以及'fmorgue-server'。

trans-unit.source: The server application
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序

trans-unit.source: There is no security in this application. If you expose your fmorgue-server to the Internet, you are on your own.
trans-unit.target: 这个应用程序没有任何安全性。如果你把你的fmorgue服务器暴露在互联网上,你就得靠自己了。

trans-unit.source: Try 'fmorgue -h'.
trans-unit.target: 试试'fmorgue -h'.

trans-unit.source: You also need to configure your web server, e.g. by adding a ScriptAlias directive.
trans-unit.target: 你还需要配置你的Web服务器,比如添加一个ScriptAlias指令。

trans-unit.source: [fmorgue-server]
trans-unit.target: [fmorgue服务器]

trans-unit.source: based on modification time and size, which makes it suitable for archiving rotated log files.
trans-unit.target: 根据修改时间和大小,使其适合于对旋转的日志文件进行存档。

trans-unit.source: dir=/tmp/
trans-unit.target: dir=/tmp/

trans-unit.source: fmorgue http://my.archive.example.com/ /var/log/*.log
trans-unit.target: fmorgue http://my.archive.example.com//var/log/*.log。

trans-unit.source: name is expected to be changing (think logrotate). You can add the original host name and file name
trans-unit.target: 名字预计会发生变化(想想logrotate)。您可以添加原始主机名和文件名。

trans-unit.source: of the files are missing, they are immediately transferred to the server.
trans-unit.target: 的文件丢失,它们会被立即转移到服务器上。

trans-unit.source: the given list of files and asks the server which files need to be transfered. In case some
trans-unit.target: 给定的文件列表,并询问服务器需要传输哪些文件。如果一些

trans-unit.source: to the generated file name on server side.
trans-unit.target: 到服务器端生成的文件名。

trans-unit.source: withhostname=no
trans-unit.target: withhostname=no

trans-unit.source: withorigname=no
trans-unit.target: withorigname=no
